entries.title: Faster Video Page Loading
entries.summary: Show useful recommendations immediately when a video page opens, so users do not see an empty screen while details load.

entries.title: More Similar Videos on Scroll
entries.summary: Load and reveal more similar videos directly on the video page as users scroll, instead of limiting to a very short list.

entries.title: Richer Video Details
entries.summary: Show more complete video information on the page, including clearer category and tags presentation.

entries.title: Comments Under Videos
entries.summary: Display video comments below the player in a readable, lightweight format.

entries.title: Optional UI Style System Upgrade
entries.summary: Evaluate and potentially adopt a more consistent styling approach to make UI changes easier and cleaner over time.

entries.title: Switchable Feed Modes
entries.summary: Let users switch between recommendation styles like personalized, recent, random, and popular feeds.

entries.title: About Page Link Analytics
entries.summary: Track outbound link clicks from the About page to better understand what users find useful.

entries.title: Remove One Like
entries.summary: Allow users to remove a single liked video without resetting the whole likes profile.

entries.title: Expandable Video Description
entries.summary: Make long descriptions easier to read with a collapsed view and a show more/show less toggle.

entries.title: Video Search Page
entries.summary: Add a dedicated search experience to help users quickly find videos by text query.

entries.title: Clearer Developer Documentation in Code
entries.summary: Improve inline descriptions in code to make maintenance and future changes faster.

entries.title: Smarter Popular Feed Variety
entries.summary: Improve popular feed selection so it keeps quality while showing more varied results.

entries.title: Seed-Based Crawl Mode
entries.summary: Support a crawl mode that starts from one instance and expands through related federated content.

entries.title: Recommendations Overview Refresh
entries.summary: Publish a clearer and more accurate public explanation of how recommendations are generated.

entries.title: Automatic Random Cache Refresh
entries.summary: Refresh random content in the background so recommendations stay fresh without manual restarts.

entries.title: Better Incremental Similarity Updates
entries.summary: Improve similarity refresh logic so existing videos also benefit when new content arrives.

entries.title: More Diverse Up Next Results
entries.summary: Reduce repetitive similar-video results on refresh and improve coverage for low-candidate videos.

entries.title: Stable Similarity Index IDs
entries.summary: Use stable internal IDs for similarity indexing to keep recommendation quality reliable across rebuilds and cleanups.

entries.title: Engine/Client Architecture Split with Bridge (ActivityPub-Ready)
entries.summary: Separate Engine into read-only analytics API (including crawler as part of Engine), move user actions to client responsibility, and add a temporary bridge ingest contract prepared for future ActivityPub integration.

entries.title: Request Lifecycle Logs with Request ID
entries.summary: Log request start and request end with one shared request ID and reuse this ID across server request-path logs for clear traceability.

entries.title: Timestamped Request Logs
entries.summary: Include explicit date and time in application request logs in a single consistent format.

entries.title: Static Page Visit Logs for About and Changelog
entries.summary: Add dedicated visibility for About and Changelog page visits served by nginx, with request correlation where possible.

entries.title: Random Cache Refresh Without Startup Downtime
entries.summary: Keep API startup non-blocking and refresh random cache in the background with safe atomic swap.

entries.title: Similarity Cache Shadow Swap Without Long Downtime
entries.summary: Build similarity cache in a shadow database while API is running, then switch atomically with safe rollback.

entries.title: Zero-Downtime Server Deploy
entries.summary: Run a new server instance on a second port, switch nginx automatically after health check, and keep rollback safety.

entries.title: Prod/Dev Installers: Separate Engine/Client Installers + Centralized Mode Installer
entries.summary: Add dedicated Engine and Client installers plus one centralized mode-based installer (prod/dev) so both contours use separate systemd unit names, isolated ports, and can run in parallel without cross-impact.

entries.title: Smoke Tests for Installer/Uninstaller Flow and Engine/Client Interaction
entries.summary: Add dedicated smoke tests with a full installer/uninstaller script matrix (centralized, wrappers, service-specific), strict runtime HTTP behavior checks (prod/dev contour routing and e2e bridge flow), and guaranteed zero-residual cleanup.

entries.title: Split Architecture Smoke Test (Engine/Client Boundaries + Bridge Flow)
entries.summary: Add a dedicated smoke test that validates Engine/Client endpoint ownership, health checks, and Client-to-Engine bridge interaction flow with clear failure diagnostics.

entries.title: Changelog as Public Task Board
entries.summary: Show roadmap-style tasks with status fields and split views for completed and not completed tasks in the client.

entries.title: Strict Client-Engine Decoupling (API-Only Contract)
entries.summary: Remove direct Client imports of Engine modules and direct Engine DB reads, and enforce interaction only via explicit Engine HTTP read/bridge contracts.

entries.title: Engine Recommendations: Interaction-Signals Only (No Local Users DB Likes)
entries.summary: Finish split architecture by removing Engine recommendation dependence on local users likes tables and using only bridge-ingested aggregated interaction signals for write-derived ranking inputs.

entries.title: Uninstall Scripts for Engine/Client Service Installers
entries.summary: Add symmetric uninstall scripts for Engine and Client plus centralized prod/dev/all uninstall orchestration so contour services and installer-created artifacts can be removed safely and predictably.

entries.title: UI Reads via Client Gateway Only (No Direct Engine Calls)
entries.summary: Route recommendations/similar/read requests through Client backend proxy endpoints so frontend uses Client as the single API gateway while Client talks to Engine internally.

entries.title: Full Docstring Coverage for Functional Code
entries.summary: Add and normalize module/class/function docstrings across all functional source files, excluding markdown/html/json and generated artifacts.
